title: 1953년 Peeler 사건
summary: 미국 Texas, TX 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Peeler. 판결일: 1953-11-25. 법원: Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: PEELER v. STATE
**판결일**: 1953-11-25
**법원**: Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas
**관할**: Texas, TX

**판사**: Morrison

## 변호인

Ross Hoffman, Brady, for appellant., Wesley Dice, State’s Atty., of Austin, for the State.

## 인용

- 262 S.W.2d 406

## 판결문 요약


MORRISON, Judge.
The offense is possession of heroin; the punishment, ten years.
The record is before us without a statement of facts or bills of exception.
All the proceedings appearing regular and nothing being presented for our review, the judgment of the trial court is affirmed.
...
